Interface ClassHierarchyResolver.ClassHierarchyInfo

Enclosing interface:
ClassHierarchyResolverPREVIEW
public static sealed interface ClassHierarchyResolver.ClassHierarchyInfo
ClassHierarchyInfo is a preview API of the Java platform.
Programs can only use ClassHierarchyInfo when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
Information about a resolved class.
Since:
22

    Indicates that a class is a declared class, with the specific given super class.
